subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The first-place Minnesota Twins made their revamped bullpen more versatile for the pennant race by acquiring the left-handed reliever Brian Fuentes from the Los Angeles Angels on Friday for a player to be named.
snippet: The first-place Minnesota Twins made their revamped bullpen more versatile for the pennant race by acquiring the left-handed reliever Brian Fuentes from the Los Angeles Angels on Friday for a player to be named.
